attributes.title: Samhara Can Be Destruction Or Rejuvenation - What Do You Choose?
attributes.description:
27 JUNE 2020 - COURTYARD SESSION

*THIS IS THE MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM PARAMASHIVA. I AM OPENING IT AS IT IS:

*PARAMASHIVA’S FIVE ACTIONS, DIMENSIONS ARE 1) CREATION, 2) MAINTENANCE, SUSTENANCE, 3) DESTRUCTION AND REJUVENATION TOGETHER, 4) PUTTING IN DELUSION, PULLING OUT OF DELUSION BOTH TOGETHER, 5) LIBERATION.

*TATPURUSHA, SADYOJATA, AGHORA, VAMADEVA, ISHANA - ARE THE FIVE FACES, DIMENSIONS OF PARAMASHIVA.

*SRISHTI - GENERATION, CREATION
STHITI - SUSTENANCE, MAINTENANCE
SAMHARA - DESTRUCTION AND REJUVENATION TOGETHER
TROBHAVA - PUTTING IN DELUSION, PULLING OUT OF DELUSION, BOTH
ANUGRAHA - LIBERATION

*THE THIRD ACTION IS INTENSELY HAPPENING. DESTRUCTION AND REJUVENATION, PARAMASHIVA IS DOING THROUGH THE ANANDA TANDAVA, ALL OVER THE WORLD. 

*IF YOU GET DELUDED NOW, DESTRUCTION WILL HAPPEN. IF YOU STAND WITH POWERFUL COGNITIONS, REJUVENATION AND PULLING OUT OF DELUSION WILL HAPPEN. 

*SAMHARA IS HAPPENING SO POWERFULLY ALL OVER THE WORLD. BY DECEMBER 14TH, WORLD WILL BE TOTALLY DIFFERENT. MARK MY WORDS. IT IS NOT JUST CORONA ALONE. CORONA CAUGHT THE PUBLIC AND MEDIA ATTENTION, THAT'S ALL. ALL OVER THE WORLD MULTIPLE OTHER THINGS ARE HAPPENING….

*CORONA IS PART OF THE TEACHING, NOT PART OF THE WEAPON. IT IS NOT SHASTRA - WEAPON TO DESTROY HUMAN BEING. IT IS SHAASTRA - TEACHING FOR HUMAN BEINGS. 

*IT’S IMPACT ON LIFE AND LIVELIHOOD IS SUCH... HOW WE LIVE, TRAVEL, RELATE WITH EACH OTHER, HOW WE THINK ABOUT EVERYTHING HAS DRASTICALLY CHANGED AND GOING THROUGH MORE CHANGES.  

*WE ARE ALL BLESSED. WE DON'T REMEMBER SEEING SRISHTI - CREATION. WE SAW THE MAINTENANCE FACE OF PARAMASHIVA. BUT MANY WHO DIED ARE NOT BLESSED ENOUGH TO SEE SAMHARA IN FRONT OF THEIR EYES! 

*IN THE AIR, IN THE WHOLE SKY, SPACE, I CAN SEE PARAMASHIVA’S SAMHARA FACE! THE AGHORA IS OPEN, AVAILABLE!

*IF YOU HOLD ONTO PARAMASHIVA WITH POWERFUL COGNITION NOW, REJUVENATION WILL HAPPEN TO YOU, NOT DESTRUCTION. THE AGHORA FACE OF PARAMASHIVA WILL NOT DESTROY YOU. IT WILL REJUVENATE YOU. YOU WILL NOT BE PUT IN DELUSION. YOU WILL BE PULLED OUT OF DELUSION. NOW IN A GRAND WAY, PARAMASHIVA’S AGHORA FACE IS OPENING. 

*FOCUS INTENSELY ON ENLIGHTENMENT. SPEND MORE AND MORE TIME ON CONSCIOUSNESS. 

*MONEY, RELATIONSHIPS, MORAL, LEGAL, ECONOMICAL, SOCIAL CONTRACTS, IDEAS OF RIGHT AND WRONG, SOCIAL AND MORAL ETHICS, WHATEVER IS VALUED OR DISRESPECTED IN SOCIETY, GOOD OR BAD AS PER SOCIETY, GOOD OR BAD AS PER LAW - ALL OF THEM ARE LOSING THEIR VALUE IN LIFE. THEY ARE MELTING DOWN IN FRONT OF THE FACE OF AGHORA. WAIT TILL DECEMBER 14TH. YOU WILL SEE A TOTALLY DIFFERENT WORLD. 

*WHATEVER YOU THINK AS VERY VALUABLE NOW WILL NOT HAVE ANY VALUE. AND WHAT YOU THINK AS NOT MUCH VALUABLE WILL SUDDENLY HAVE A LOT OF VALUE. 

*MANY HUMAN BEINGS THINK A FEW HOURS OF WORKING AND MAKING FEW DOLLARS IS MORE VALUABLE THAN A FEW HOURS OF YOGA. BY MAKING FEW DOLLARS YOU MAY GET THE FOOD, A FEW VARIETIES OF SWEETS, BUT YOU LOST THE BODY THAT CAN ENJOY IT. THAT IS WHAT I CALL DELUDED LIFESTYLE. PEOPLE WILL GET MONEY BUT NOT THE LIFESTYLE TO ENJOY LIFE.

*IF YOU SPEND ONE YEAR AND MAKE 1 OR 10 OR 25 CRORE, I WILL SAY SPEND THE SAME ONE YEAR DAY AND NIGHT AND BUILD A YOGIC BODY WHICH WILL BE MORE VALUABLE FOR YOU AFTER DECEMBER 14TH. MARK ALL MY WORDS. 

*WHEN THERE IS DESTRUCTION IN SUCH LARGE SCALE, DON'T BE AFRAID. LEARN TO CELEBRATE PARAMASHIVA - AGHORA FACE. WHATEVER PAIN YOU CARRIED BY NOT HAVING ALL THOSE THINGS ARE LOSING VALUE! CELEBRATE IT! IF YOU HAD PAIN THAT YOU DON’T HAVE ENOUGH MONEY, NOW ANYONE WHO HAS IT HAS NO VALUE! CELEBRATE IT! IF YOU HAVE SO MUCH ANGER THAT YOU DON'T HAVE REAL ESTATE, EVEN IF SOMEONE HAS IT, THEY CAN’T COME OUT OF IT OR GO INTO IT NOW! CELEBRATE!

*I CAN SEE PARAMASHIVA’S AGHORA FACE DANCING! 

*IF YOU BUILD THE BODY THAT CAN EAT ALL THE FOOD AND DIGEST AND BE ALIVE INSTEAD OF MULTI-BILLION DOLLARS AFTER DECEMBER 14TH, YOU ARE RICH! BECAUSE MULTI-BILLION DOLLARS IS MELTING DOWN. 

Rea more at: www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4036877916400028
